main event: Mr. and Mrs. X observed a cigar-shaped object glowing reddish-orange, emitting a bluish-white exhaust trail while driving near Hartford, Connecticut, on September 6, 1960.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about two minutes before the object disappeared; witnesses described the object as being approximately 30-40 feet in diameter; the sightings were investigated as part of Project Blue Book; no sound was heard during the observation; both witnesses were considered credible.
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. X, credible witnesses
